Delia Bennet (1892-1976) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe

A na-ejikọta ya na ndị na-emepụta akwa akwa Gee's Bend, a na-ekwukwa na ọ bụ "ónyé isi nke ma eleghị anya ezinụlọ kachasị ukwuu nke ndị na-eme akwa akwa na Gee's bend". A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Philadelphia Museum of Art.
A mụrụ ya na 1892 na SS Pettway na Pleasant Pettway, a zụlitere Delia Bennett na Brown Plantation na Gee's Bend, Alabama
Ọ lụrụ Eddie Bennett ma ha zụlitere ụmụ nwanyị asaá na ụmụ nwoke anọ ọnụ
Bennett na di ya bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-azụ onwe ha, na-akụ nri n'azụ ụlọ ha
A manyere ha ka ha na-akụ ogho n'efu iji gbanwere ibi n'ala ubi, nke ezinụlọ Spurlin nwèrè na Camden, Alabama.
